title: [LAN] Lyon eSport 2018

embed.title: Lyon e-Sport 2018 | Home
embed.description: Lyon e-Sport, production et co-production d'événements.

body:
We are pleased to announce the Lyon e-Sport 2018!

This new exceptional edition will take place at the Lyon Convention Center on the 16th, 17th and 18th of February 2018.
In this new place, 4 time larger, numerous esport and video games activities will be set up, as well as an even more spectacular stage and the opening of a large exhibition area.

On the players side, the event will host a great League of Legends tournament with a 30 000€ cashprize!
Brace yourself! Registrations will open on the friday 15th of December at 8pm CET.

You can find all information on our website: http://2018.lyon-esport.fr/actualites/ouverture-inscriptions-15-decembre/

About Lyon e-Sport:
We are a bunch of eSport passionates, all volunteers, willing to promote it in France. Created in 2011, the non-profit organization has grown fast and is today preparing its 10th edition, opening it to foreign teams and fans.
